writer.name: 阿曼多·罗伯斯·戈多伊 Armando Robles Godoy

director.name: 阿曼多·罗伯斯·戈多伊 Armando Robles Godoy

this_title: En la selva no hay estrellas
introduction: This adventure film features a treasure hunter trying to transport a cache of gold belonging to a tribal queen from the Amazon jungle. The main focus is made on his attempt to move the heavy gold from the dangerous and exotic jungle, and this "golden rush" can cost the protagonist’s life. Golden Prize of V MIFF (1967).A treasure hunter tries to transport a cache of gold belonging to a tribal queen from the Amazon jungle in this routine adventure. Customs of the local natives and the hero's life in the city are thrown in, but the main focus is his attempt to move the heavy gold from the dangerous and exotic jungle.
foreign_title: En la selva no hay estrellas
